item.title: Creating an archetype from an existing project
item.description: If you are creating a cloud of microservices or are in an environment where you have to generate multiple maven projects or modules, it is very useful to create archetypes to handle these new modules/projects creation. What is an archetype? A Maven archetype is a templated project. Maven offers several archetypes that allow you to create new maven modules ready to run in few seconds. How to use a generic archetype?
